zendesk.belvedere

Class BelvedereDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatDialogFragment
      • zendesk.belvedere.BelvedereDialog

  • public class BelvedereDialog
extends AppCompatDialogFragment
    This is a DialogFragment that allows the user to select an image source.

    Based on the available permissions, this dialog allows the user to select images from a gallery or from a camera app.
